column4: Is Ubuntu COMPLETELY free? or does it have non-free compoments?
It has some proprietary drivers included as options by default.  If you're looking for "completely, 100%" Free (as in Speech), you should check out Gobuntu, Ubuntu's 100% Free flavor
What does mean "proprietary drivers". Will I have to pay for them?
no, if we're just talking free (as in beer) then yes, Ubuntu is 100% cost-free.  The drivers are closed-source, like video card stuff that nvidia puts out for their graphics cards.
